pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: Introduce the BÃ¥nder media server, explaining its purpose as a self-hosted music and movie server with desktop and web clients

pages.title: Architecture Overview
pages.purpose: High-level system architecture showing how backend Laravel API, frontend React/Electron app, and media processing components interact

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.purpose: Guide for setting up the development environment and running the application locally

pages.title: Prerequisites & Installation
pages.purpose: Required software, Docker setup, dependency installation via Composer and Yarn

pages.title: Development Server
pages.purpose: Using the DevServerCommand to run Octane, queue worker, and scheduler with hot-reloading

pages.title: Development Workflow
pages.purpose: Common development tasks, artisan commands, and testing procedures

pages.title: Electron
pages.purpose: Desktop cross platform applications, architecture, menu system

pages.title: Backend Architecture
pages.purpose: Overview of the Laravel backend structure, services, and data layer

pages.title: HTTP Kernel & Middleware Pipeline
pages.purpose: Middleware stack, CORS configuration, OpenTelemetry instrumentation, and request lifecycle

pages.title: Authentication System
pages.purpose: Authentication guards, OAuth2 with PKCE, token management, Sanctum configuration, and token binding security

pages.title: API Controllers
pages.purpose: REST API endpoints for authentication, media resources, job management, queue monitoring, and logs

pages.title: Background Jobs & Queue System
pages.purpose: Laravel Horizon queue monitoring, job dispatching, library scanning jobs, and queue metrics

pages.title: Media Processing Pipeline
pages.purpose: Music and movie library scanning, metadata extraction from MusicBrainz/Discogs, and BlurHash image generation

pages.title: Database Schema & Models
pages.purpose: PostgreSQL schema, Eloquent models, relationships, and data persistence patterns

pages.title: Frontend Architecture
pages.purpose: Overview of the React/TypeScript frontend structure, state management, and API integration

pages.title: Application Entry Point
pages.purpose: App.tsx structure, routing (HashRouter vs BrowserRouter), theme provider, and initialization

pages.title: State Management
pages.purpose: Zustand store architecture, slices (musicPlayer, equalizer, notifications, ui), and persistence

pages.title: Event Bridge System
pages.purpose: Pub/sub event system for cross-component communication and coordination with Redux middleware

pages.title: API Client Integration
pages.purpose: Orval-generated API client, React Query hooks, Axios configuration, and type-safe backend communication

pages.title: Build System & Configuration
pages.purpose: Vite configuration, TypeScript setup, path aliases, asset processing, and dependency management

pages.title: Authentication & Security
pages.purpose: Client-side authentication flow, OAuth PKCE implementation, and session management

pages.title: OAuth Client Implementation
pages.purpose: BaanderOAuthClient class, PKCE flow, token exchange, and storage mechanisms

pages.title: Music Player System
pages.purpose: Complete music playback system including UI, audio processing, and queue management

pages.title: Inline Player Component
pages.purpose: Player UI, audio element management, stream token handling, and playback controls

pages.title: Audio Processing Engine
pages.purpose: AudioProcessor service, Web Audio API graph, WASM DSP modules, and multi-threaded analysis

pages.title: WASM Audio Analysis
pages.purpose: AudioWorklets, Web Workers, loudness (LUFS), dynamics (RMS, true peak), and spectral features

pages.title: Equalizer & Effects
pages.purpose: 10-band EQ, dynamics compression, spatial enhancement, and volume normalization

pages.title: Library & Media UI
pages.purpose: User interfaces for browsing and managing media libraries

pages.title: Song List & Virtualization
pages.purpose: Infinite scrolling song list, React Table integration, virtualization for performance, and sorting
